document.full_text: officials in wisconsin's largest county said on thursday they would meet the deadline for finishing their review of the local vote in last week's state supreme court race, an election widely seen as a referendum on republican efforts to curb public sector unions.
document.title: recount clock to begin ticking in wisconsin court race
lines_and_colors: officials in wisconsin's largest county said on thursday they would meet the deadline for finishing their review of the local vote in last week's state supreme court race, an election widely seen as a referendum on republican efforts to curb public sector unions.
